name: Alec-heif.github.io
body:
Ever visited an ugly, hard-to-look-at site? Re-SS parses all the visible characters in a site, animates them, and rearranges them into a complex art form! Draw your own picture beforehand or choose from our gallery and let Re-SS give that ugly site a makeover! Available as a Chrome and Firefox-supported bookmarklet.

Re-SS was our entry for the Fall 2013 Y-Hack at Yale University. Authored by @alec-heif, @paerhati, and William Wong.

Screenshots of app use here:

![Before Re-SS Starts](https://raw.github.com/alec-heif/alec-heif.github.io/master/Prior.png)

![In-Progress Part 1](https://raw.github.com/alec-heif/alec-heif.github.io/master/Progress%201.png)

![In-Progress Part 2](https://raw.github.com/alec-heif/alec-heif.github.io/master/Progress%202.png)

![Final Result](https://raw.github.com/alec-heif/alec-heif.github.io/master/Final.png)

Hope you enjoy!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
